entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Sudbury (Greater)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:02 PM EST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -8.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Greater Sudbury Airport 01:00 AM EST Tuesday 28 February 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -8.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.2 kPa falling
Visibility: 4.0 km
Humidity: 82 %
Wind Chill: -15
Dewpoint: -10.8°C
Wind: ENE 18 km/h gust 28 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Monday night: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 8.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning late this evening. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Temperature steady near minus 8. Wind chill near minus 15. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High zero. POP 40%
entry.summary: Snow ending in the morning then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming west 20 km/h near noon. High zero. Wind chill minus 11 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy after midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 5 in the evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. High minus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.summary: Cloudy periods with 40 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 10. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. High minus 8. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Monday 27 February 2023
